text: Ezhamkulam is a village in Pathanamthitta district, Kerala, India. It is located about 5 km from central Adoor. ==Culture== Ezhamkulam is famous for the Ezhamkulam Devi Temple. ==Demographics== At the 2001 India census, Ezhamkulam had a population of 18,884 with 9,017 males and 9,867 females. ==References== == Other websites == *Ezhamkulam Temple *Official website from the Govt. of Kerala *Official website of Pathanamthitta district Category:Villages in Pathanamthitta district
title: Ezhamkulam
